title: "Motivo raises $12.5M Series A to speed up chip design with AI"
excerpt: "Chip design is a long slog of trial and error, taking years to bring a design to market. Motivo, a five year old startup from a chip industry veteran is creating software to speed up chip design from years to months using AI."
